short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click-to-Call Directly from Your Helpdesk, CRM, Sales Software and Any Website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Talkdeskâ“‡ Click-to-Call Extension makes placing calls seamless for sales, support, service and marketing representatives. Use this extension to convert phone numbers* into clickable links that allow quick dialing from your favorite CRM and service desk applications or any web page using Talkdesk Enterprise Cloud Contact Center. 

- Call directly from your favorite helpdesk, CRM, sales software or any website just by clicking on a phone number*. 
- Save time and effort by reducing manual work and enabling seamless dialing. 
- Streamline your workflow with advanced call functionality like call recording, mute, on hold, transfers and conferencing.

* The extension identifies all phone numbers in the e.164 format.

NOTE:
- For installation and additional information, read this article (https://support.talkdesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/204965789-Installing-Talkdesk-Click-to-Call-extension).
- To learn more about Talkdesk CX Cloud go to www.talkdesk.com.
